pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, April 30, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

Private meetings

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Khalsa Day Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
